description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              + Join to develop company’s software project
              
              + Develop software system and services on the global scale with multi-language support
              
              + Study documents, methods to develop the system
              
              + Other tasks assigned by company
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              *C #
              
              + 2 year experience minimum in software development .Net, C# (Winform) or C++.
              
              + Great knowledge of developing (OOP) and MVC, MVVC.
              
              + Experience in JSON/XML và Resful API.
              
              + Knowledge of window service and ability to build applications.
              
              + Efficient use of MS SQL Server or Oracle.
              
              + Experience in integrating SDK and optimizing the system
              
              + Have experience in video player, streaming and codec.
              
              + Used to develop Window phone.
              
              + Used to develop Server or mobile apps (Android or IOS).
              
              + Knowledge of internet security
              
              + Critical thinking
              

              *Android
              
              + 1 year experience minimum in Android development
              
              + Knowledge of Android Architecture.
              
              + Focusing more on Java core and OOP/Design Pattern.
              
              + Working experience with JSON, HTTP, RESTful services.
              
              + Experience in using SQLite or similar databases.
              
              + Good knowledge of Local Services, Push Notifications.
              
              + Knowledge of analyzing and optimizing memory, performance.
              
              + Great knowledge of Bluetooth protocol.
              
              + Experience in controlling version systems like Git, SVN.
              

              *IOS
              
              + 1 year experience minimum in IOS development
              
              + Knowledge of iOS Architecture, Objective-C, Swift.
              
              + Great knowledge of Location Services, Push Notifications, Core Data,
              
              + Experience in third-party libraries and APIs
              
              + Experience in unit test and continuous integration
              
              + Knowledge of  MVC, MVVM architecture as plus
              
              + Ability to communicate in English (Good writing and acceptable speaking).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Thưởng cuối năm; thưởng dự án; điều chỉnh lương hàng năm; team-building; nghỉ mát
               







                Chế độ bảo hiểm và các chế độ khác của công ty
               







                12 ngày phép năm, môi trường làm việc thân thiện, năng động, chuyên nghiệp
